title: Banks push for fewer restrictions with Trump's blessing
text:
Banks push for fewer restrictions with Trump's blessing 4:14am IST - 01:59
Emboldened by President Trump’s pledge to loosen laws introduced following the 2007-2009 global financial crisis, U.S. banks are pushing to scrap or revise more than a dozen other lesser-known rules they say are outdated, costly and hurt economic growth. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
